name: express-user-manager
description: A user management and authentication library for Express apps.

scripts.test: npm run test:db:all && npm run test:e2e:all
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:e2e:routes && npm run test:e2e:routes:custom
scripts.test:db:all: npm run test:db:memory && npm run test:db:mongoose && npm run test:db:mysql && npm run test:db:sqlite
scripts.test:e2e:all: npm run test:e2e:memory && npm run test:e2e:mongoose && npm run test:e2e:mysql && npm run test:e2e:sqlite
scripts.test:db:mongoose:nix: DB_ADAPTER=mongoose DB_PORT=27017 DB_USERNAME='' npm run test:db
scripts.test:db:mongoose:win32: set DB_ADAPTER=mongoose& set DB_PORT=27017& set DB_USERNAME=& npm run test:db
scripts.test:db:mysql:nix: DB_ENGINE=mysql DB_PORT=3306 DB_USERNAME=root npm run test:db:sequelize:nix
scripts.test:db:mysql:win32: set DB_ENGINE=mysql& set DB_PORT=3306& set DB_USERNAME=root& npm run test:db:sequelize:win32
scripts.test:db:sqlite:win32: set DB_ENGINE=sqlite& set DB_STORAGE_PATH=./.data/sqlite& npm run test:db:sequelize:win32
scripts.test:e2e:mongoose:nix: DB_ADAPTER=mongoose DB_PORT=27017 DB_USERNAME='' npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e:mongoose:win32: set DB_ADAPTER=mongoose& set DB_PORT=27017& set DB_USERNAME=& npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e:mysql:nix: DB_ENGINE=mysql DB_PORT=3306 DB_USERNAME=root npm run test:e2e:sequelize:nix
scripts.test:e2e:mysql:win32: set DB_ENGINE=mysql& set DB_PORT=3306& set DB_USERNAME=root& npm run test:e2e:sequelize:win32
scripts.test:e2e:sqlite:win32: set DB_ENGINE=sqlite& set DB_STORAGE_PATH=./.data/sqlite& npm run test:e2e:sequelize:win32

author: simplymichael <simplymichaelorji@gmail.com> (https://github.com/simplymichael)

ghooks.pre-commit: npm run lint && npm run test:coverage
